text: 7 Seconds is a 2005 British Romanian Swiss American crime action thriller movie directed by Simon Fellows and starring Wesley Snipes, Tamzin Outhwaite, DeObia Oparei, Georgina Rylance, Pete Lee-Wilson. It was released on direct- to-DVD in the United States and was distributed by Sony Pictures Home Entertainment. == Other websites == * * Category:2005 crime thriller movies Category:2005 action movies Category:2000s action thriller movies Category:British crime thriller movies Category:British action thriller movies Category:Romanian crime movies Category:Romanian action movies Category:Romanian thriller movies Category:Swiss crime movies Category:Swiss action movies Category:Swiss thriller movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:American action thriller movies
title: 7 Seconds (movie)
